subject: Olympic Games (2008)
lead_paragraph: The Olympic 100-meter champion Justin Gatlin will have his appeal of a four-year doping ban heard next month by the Court of Arbitration for Sport. The hearing will take place May 28 and 29.
snippet: The Olympic 100-meter champion Justin Gatlin will have his appeal of a four-year doping ban heard next month by the Court of Arbitration for Sport. The hearing will take place May 28 and 29.
